short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension which helps to review the web content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the YRE Jury/Admin members to rate the submissions. The submission details will be logged and analyzed inside the admin CRM platform.
